website_summaries.verdict: Holds several people and will accommodate your closest furry friends as well.
pros: Known to hold up in white water rapids
Brings peace of mind to those who live in areas where hurricanes and flooding occur and need a responsive raft that can get them to safety
Material is also tough enough to withstand your pet's sharp nails
cons: Some customers would prefer stronger oars

customer_reviews.title: This boat has plenty of room to comfortably fit 3 to 4 average size adults or
customer_reviews.text: This boat has plenty of room to comfortably fit 3 to 4 average size adults or, in my case, 2 average size adults & 2 small dogs. It's well made, I didn't feel like I had to worry about the dogs' nails popping it like I would with some more flimsy boats. The included air pump inflated it pretty fast, especially for it's size. If you are looking for a good deal on an inflatable boat that will last, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Great Raft But Garbage Oars And Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is good product and a good raft. I have taken it down some 2 pluses and a 3 minus white water rapids and it held up just fine. I have bounced off rock and ran over tree branches and I am still floating. My only complaint is the oars and the pump. They are essential garbage. The oars more than the pump. Right? I know. Weird. The connectors on the oars will constantly brake, and you will end up having to order more which will break again or design your own from product acquired at home depot. Your better off buying your own Carlisle oars and pump than getting this combo kit. Just buy the raft by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Father of Superman

customer_reviews.title: Taken this on over two dozen rafting trips over two ...
customer_reviews.text: Taken this on over two dozen rafting trips over two years and its still going strong! Have yet to need to use the patch kit. This thing has held up amazingly well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BOAT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BOAT! I would say it fits 2 adults comfortably and its great for relaxing. Its kind of hard to row the boat with the paddles it comes with and i feel like im going to pop it when i have them inserted in the slots but its nice that it comes with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: samesgurl

customer_reviews.title: Great little boat for summer lake fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Much larger than I had thought it would be. My daughter and her cousins had a great time in it out on the lake this summer. I would purchase this boat again but I would also purchase an electric pump to make the inflation process faster.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit! I’ve had it for years and still works great! Have taken it on numerous float trips and it still works!! Lost the pillows on the first trip though lol.
customer_reviews.author: sasha s

customer_reviews.title: The oars are stupid, but besides that
customer_reviews.text: The oars are stupid, but besides that, this boat is amazing. I would buy a double sided kayak to go with it instead though, as these don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Not a good boat for all situations. But nice enough for fair to good conditions. The outer two chambers has the nice inflation valves but the floor has the same kind you'd find on a cheap float.
customer_reviews.author: J spikes

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 300lb guys in this thing and it didn't go under. I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: David Wall

customer_reviews.title: Good boat
customer_reviews.text: Great boat. I go fishing in it (lol dont get a hook stuck in it), survived one year of fishing and a little ride on the lake. Might even use it for a second year.
customer_reviews.author: Moso

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Blows up pretty fast and painless with the included pump and is durable. I love it. It's a good size for two adults and some gear.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamcass

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. They are 15 and 16 and all 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters. We live on a lake and they wanted something to row around the cove. This was perfect. They are 15 and 16 and all 3 fit easily in it.
customer_reviews.author: RBeth

customer_reviews.title: 3 person inflatable boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boat because I read all of the reviews, and they were correct.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm L. Mac Leod

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Quickly shipped, arrived in protective box, exactly what I expected and needed - great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Therese

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The boat came as advertised. It worked great but I would not want to fill it with that hand pump. It was awesome on the King's River.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dolezal

customer_reviews.title: Depending on where you go with this boat
customer_reviews.text: Maybe good for lakes! My personal experience says that this boat is not good for rafting. For one rafting on a relatively mild river I got three holes on two chambers. The boat didn't sink though thanks to three separate chambers! The repair kit is very simple. The patches come with it look like budget platic and not strong enough for serious business. Considering the application of this boat, and its price, material, durability and maintenance, I gave it 3 stars: 1 for rafting; 4.5 for the price and maybe 4 for boating on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: abun

customer_reviews.title: This works great for 2 tall people
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both tall. This works great for 2 tall people. I wouldn't go 3 unless it was a small child maybe. I gave it a 5 star because it is a good price for us making our occasional float down the river. It isn't heavy duty but I believe it is sufficient and workable for the price and our purpose. We're happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole O

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: was not sure how good it would be for the price but when i got it in the mail and blew it up i was impressed with the quality of it. now i am getting a motor mount and putting my trolling motor on it to see how well it does with that :)
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything you need in one box! Just add life preservers!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Great raft for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described, easy to fill. The pump works great. The seller had sent us an email stating that if the raft seemed to be a little deflated in the first couple of uses to simply fill with more air and that as the material stretches it will stop loosing air. It did seem to loose a little air the first few uses but nothing major. We've been out on the lake almost everyday and we've enjoyed it tremendously. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Popped fast. Material is much less durable than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Popped fast. Material is much less durable than the challenger 300 my buddy has. Mine popped on the grass just before we put in... it's third use. Tear was on the seam and not patchable.
customer_reviews.author: Sir smokes a lot

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Great rafts for a great price. Extremely roomy for 2 people!!! I could fit me, my husband, and 3 small kids in just one raft!
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for two people to go fishing. I use it on a large lake and it's perfect for getting in to small spaces. I did however get a small whole In the floor of the boat the second time out from a fish. But I patched it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Johhnnnn

customer_reviews.title: Oars are very sturdy. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than my sons 4 man boat. Oars are very sturdy. Well made. Great quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer j meyer

customer_reviews.title: Intex Challenger 3
customer_reviews.text: The boat is good quality; however the oars are horrible. Broke the first time they were used. This was disappointing to my 11 year old who received this as a Birthday gift! Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: mglarsen

customer_reviews.title: Boat fine. Paddle lost piece on first outing.
customer_reviews.text: Raft is great, but a piece fell off the paddle on the first outing. Kerplunk into the lake, we did nothing to cause this that we can identify. Now we have a one-paddled boat and I have to remember to contact the company for a new part. I hope they will supply it quickly and for no additional cost. If they do I will increase my stars rating.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: I love the Boston valves and for the price it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Have taken this boat out about 8 times and every time was simple. I love the Boston valves and for the price it is a steal. I have a motor mount and a minn Kota trolling motor and it is very strong and durable for the price. I have had other more expensive boats that have developed holes and damage, but at this price point there is no competition.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn_P

customer_reviews.title: happy with challenger
customer_reviews.text: I love this boat..i do some modification which i seen from youtube..
customer_reviews.author: Cris Pabillore

product_meta.title: Intex Challenger 3 Inflatable Raft Boat Set with Pump and Oars | 68370EP
product_meta.description: 68370E Features: -Challenger boat kit. -3 air chambers including inner auxiliary chamber inside main hull. -Two quick-fill, fast-deflate boston valves . -Rugged vinyl construction. -2 Inflatable seat cushions. -All-around grab line. -Inflatable I-beam floor for comfort and rigidity. -Grab handles on bow. -Welded on oar locks. -Includes 2 48" aluminum oars and high output hand pump. -Oar holders. -Motor mount fittings. -U. S. Coast Guard I. D. -Repair kit, shelf box. -TUV approved. Specifications: -Capacity: 660 lbs. -Inflated dimensions: 54" H x 116" W x 17" D. -Package dimensions: 24. 5" H x 17" W x 9. 5" D.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Seats 2 adults and one child comfortably
Resistant to damage from abrasion, impact, and sunlight
Unaffected by gasoline, oil, and salt water
3 air chambers including inner auxiliary chamber inside main hull
